mapper.select: SELECT token_idx AS tokenIdx, email, device_id AS deviceId, access_token AS accessToken, created_at AS createdAt, expired_at AS expiredAt, is_valid AS isValid FROM user_tokens WHERE device_id = #{deviceId} AND access_token = #{accessToken}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tokens ( email, device_id, access_token, created_at, expired_at, is_valid ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{deviceId}, #{accessToken}, #{createdAt}, #{expiredAt}, #{isValid} )
